Standard.Name: Missing Hacienda Farms Unlock Trigger Creative Mode
Hacienda Farm Herbs/Orchids Unlock Trigger Creative Mode

ImyaTweaks.Title: Features of Hacienda Overhaul: Missing Hacienda Farms
ImyaTweaks.Description: Adjust the features of the module, concerning the fertility requirment of the newly added and previously missing Hacienda Farms for Plantains, Cotton and Tobacco.

ImyaExpose.Description: Sets whether the newly added Plantain, Cotton and Tobacco Farms requires the respective fertility.
